# Smart Home Hub

## Overview
A centralized IoT control system built with Arduino and Node.js.

## Features
- Temperature & humidity monitoring
- Smart lighting control
- Security system integration
- Mobile app dashboard

## Tech Stack
- Arduino Mega
- ESP8266 WiFi module
- DHT22 sensors
- React Native mobile app

# NFT Marketplace

## Description
A fully decentralized NFT marketplace on Ethereum.

## Key Features
- Mint NFTs with custom metadata
- Buy/sell with ETH
- IPFS storage for images
- Smart contract audited

## Technologies
- Solidity
- Hardhat
- React + Web3.js
- IPFS

## Live Demo
[View Demo](https://nft-gallery.example.com)
